Articles.Content:
Nope

The user below me owns a pet.

Yes! No! Technically, he's my dad's. But he'll always be my puppy :3

The user below me has a fish.

False. I have some fish!

hundreds of guppies to be more precise.

The user below me doesn't have a shark.

Correct! I had a shark though, once. It was delicious.

The user below me likes to put his bb code tags in the posts by hand.

:mad.: wait there another way

the person below me has been to a space program facility not ksp

True, Cape'.

The user below me can read something in a non-latin alphebet.

False, unless you count bein able to read Roscosmos in the Russian alphabet.

The user below me doesn't know who I am.

I do kinda I will, creep your posts to find out more though

the user below me thinks the sentence I just said is weird and creepy

True.

true, I didn't have my required 3 tons of irony

nope!

Only the Department from [snip], where I'll go to work this summer.

Nope I hate the Mac

I do not. Wish I did though...

No, I have a pet dog. You can see his breed in my avatar.

Uf course
